title: ID: seen this Sans before?
content:
Typophiles of the world: Have you seen this Sans Serif before? Do you know its name?

Have a look at the lower case "L" and the lower case "A". Does that ring a bell?

The (poor) scan is from a Phaidon Press book. Published in 1998, the book design was done by Stephen Wolstenholme.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803214549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_1b_6247.jpg)

Thanks in advance for giving me information on the font!
author: Gunnar

comments.content: Have a look at [FF Schulbuch Nord](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803214549/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2OL) or [AG Schoolbook Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803214549/http:/www.identifont.com/show?HG6).

Jinx again.;^D  
Hello to Andrew in London.
Yeah, right, Mark, it’s not my day, today. \*biggrin\*

Thanks guys!  
You helped a lot!
Renko, AG Schoolbook Two is right on the money!
